whatIsService.title: What Is Acne?
whatIsService.content: Acne is a common skin condition that occurs when hair follicles get clogged with oil, dead skin cells, and bacteria. This leads to pimples, blackheads, whiteheads, or deeper, painful bumps that may cause scarring or pigmentation if left untreated.

signsSymptoms.title: Signs & Symptoms of Acne
items: Large, painful lumps under the skin (nodules)
Dark spots or scars after breakouts
